mentionedBy.name: Toast
mentionedBy.notes: iPad-based POS system focused on restaurant-specific needs with strong offline capabilities. More affordable than Toast with robust back office and inventory management. Locally installed system providing full offline functionality, ideal for independent full-service restaurants.

mentionedBy.name: Toast
mentionedBy.notes: iPad-based POS focused on restaurant-specific needs. Intuitive, mobile-friendly solution ideal for food trucks, pop-ups, and casual dining. Offers strong offline functionality and is more affordable than Toast, though primarily geared toward iOS users.
